issue.title: [C++] Add order-comparisons for numeric scalars
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17290](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17290). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, only equal-comparison of scalars are supported, by `EqualComparable`. This issue will add order-comparisons, such as less-than, to numeric scalars.
